resources.string: Thank you for downloading this KernelAdiutor Plugin. Please make sure you granted root access for this application, otherwise you won\'t see its settings!

Security-Enhanced Linux is a Linux kernel security module that provides a mechanism for supporting access control security policies, including United States Department of Defenseâ€“style mandatory access controls.
Your devices doesn\'t seem to have Selinux.
Selinux is disabled on your device!
